TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hbun, title = Hbun, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hbun} }

S.FORM: alang Hbun ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 69 buwan, 180 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 64% kyan ku 116 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 36% kyan ku 64 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 62%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Hbun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Hbun hya' ga 石門水庫. tay mkyahu' na Hbun hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Hbun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Hbun hya' ga Wsilung. tay mkyahu' na Hbun hya' ga Pyasan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Hbon ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 69 bowan, 180 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 64% kyan ko 116 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 36% kyan ko 64 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 62%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Hbon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Hbon hya' ga 石門水庫. tay mkyaho' na Hbon hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Hbon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Hbon hya' ga Wsilong. tay mkyaho' na Hbon hya' ga Pyasan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
